code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,allowedRoles}=_ref;const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')||'null');if(!token||!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});if(allowedRoles&&!allowedRoles.includes(user.type)){if(user.type==='admin')return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/admin/dashboard",replace:true});if(user.isdoctor)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/doctor/dashboard",replace:true});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/user/dashboard",replace:true});}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
